name: YukkiMusic
description: A Telegram bot that streams music into group voice chats with seamless playback and control.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from my.telegram.org.

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from my.telegram.org.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram string session for the assistant.

FALLEN_API_KEY.description: API key for Fallen API (optional). You can get one from @FallenApiBot or https://tgmusic.fallenapi.fun/. If you are using cookies, you can leave this empty.

FALLEN_API_URL.description: Base URL for the Fallen API. For more info, visit @FallenApiBot or https://tgmusic.fallenapi.fun/.

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram user ID of the bot's owner.

LOGGER_ID.description: The Telegram chat ID where logs will be sent.

DURATION_LIMIT.description: The maximum duration of a track in seconds.

LEAVE_ON_DEMOTED.description: Leave the group when the bot is demoted. Set to true to enable.

QUEUE_LIMIT.description: The maximum number of tracks allowed in the queue.

START_IMG_URL.description: URL of the image to be displayed on the start message.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: The URL of your support chat.

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: The URL of your support channel.

COOKIES_LINK.description: A space-separated list of batbin.me URLs for cookies.

SET_CMDS.description: Set to 'true' to have the bot set its commands on startup.

MAX_AUTH_USERS.description: The maximum number of authorized users per chat.
